#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        for(i=(s.length()/2)-1;i>=0;i--)
            cout<<s[i];
        for(i=s.length()-1;i>(s.length()/2)-1;i--)
            cout<<s[i];
        cout<<endl;
    }
}
